name: GPT-5.2
description: OpenAI's most advanced frontier model designed for professional work and long-running agents with significant improvements in agentic tool-calling, long-context understanding, and software coding capabilities.
community_quotes: Significant improvements in agentic tool-calling and long-context understanding
Better at professional tasks than previous models
Enhanced software coding capabilities for complex development workflows

name: Google Deep Research Tool
description: Google's deepest AI research agent based on Gemini 3 Pro that developers can embed into their own applications for advanced research and coding tasks.
community_quotes: Deepest AI research agent yet from Google
Can be embedded into developer applications
Launches same day as GPT-5.2 showing AI competition

name: Mistral Vibe CLI
description: Native, open-source terminal-based AI agent that works directly in the terminal for software engineering tasks, integrating with Devstral models for agentic development.
community_quotes: Open-source terminal-based AI agent
Works directly in terminal for development workflows
Not just an IDE plugin but a native CLI experience

name: Devstral 2
description: Mistral's new AI coding model available in 24B and 123B parameter versions, designed as open-weight enterprise-grade coding models to compete with Claude and GPT.
community_quotes: Open-weight coding models for enterprise
Competitive with Claude and GPT in coding tasks
Available in multiple sizes for different use cases

name: AWS DevOps Agent
description: AWS's autonomous AI agent for CI/CD and incident response that detects outages and fixes issues in minutes, providing always-on incident triage and guided resolution.
community_quotes: Fixes issues in minutes rather than hours
Part of AWS's 'Frontier Agents' initiative
Reduces alert fatigue and improves system reliability

name: Stack Overflow MCP Server
description: MCP server that connects AI agents to Stack Overflow's vast developer knowledge base, providing real-time answers to coding problems and enhancing AI-powered development workflows.
community_quotes: Gives AI coding assistants access to proven solutions
Enhances debugging through community knowledge
Integrates with existing AI development workflows

name: Vectorize AI Agent Memory System
description: Open-source AI agent memory system that breaks 90% on LongMemEval benchmarks, enabling agents to maintain and retrieve long-term memory across sessions.
community_quotes: Breaks 90% on LongMemEval benchmarks
Open-source solution for agent memory
Enables persistent memory across development sessions

name: DeepSeek V3.2
description: Advanced reasoning-focused AI model designed for tool-use, long context, and agentic workflows, optimized specifically for coding and development tasks.
community_quotes: Reasoning-focused model optimized for coding
Strong performance on agentic workflows
